Description: AWS CloudFormation Template to setup and deploy vSBC HA instances for CXone derived from Ribbon SBC Core V12.01.00R000 AWS_HA_template.json

AMIID.Description: AMI ID of SBC : copy of ic-prod private image: ami-0dba269f4c1b5cc9f
AMIID.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid AMI ID

AdminSshKey.Description: Enter Public Key to enable SSH access to CLI via admin user
AdminSshKey.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid public key - Format: ssh-rsa <key>.

IAMRole.Description: IAM role for instances, check installation guide for more details

VpcId.Description: Select a VPC with four subnets : mgt0, ha0, pkt0 and pkt1

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 instance type.

SBCPersonality.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid SBC Personality type.

ActiveInstanceName.Description: CE name of the active instance

StandbyInstanceName.Description: CE name of the standby instance

SubnetIdMgt0.Description: SubnetId of an existing subnet in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) for Mgt0. (Mgmt Subnet)

SubnetIdHA0.Description: SubnetId of an existing subnet in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) for HA0. (HA Subnet)

SubnetIdPkt0.Description: SubnetId of an existing subnet in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) for Pkt0. (Untrust Subnet)

SubnetIdPkt1.Description: SubnetId of an existing subnet in your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) for Pkt1. (Trust Subnet)

NumberOfAlternateIPv4OnPkt0.Description: Enter Number of IPs required on PKT0 port

NumberOfAlternateIPv4OnPkt1.Description: Enter Number of IPs required on PKT1 port

NumberOfEIPV4OnPkt0.Description: Enter Number of IPv4 EIP required on PKT0 port

NumberOfEIPV4OnPkt1.Description: Enter Number of IPv4 EIP required on PKT1 port

NumberOfAlternateIpV6Pkt0.Description: Enter Number of IPv6 required on PKT0 port

NumberOfAlternateIpV6Pkt1.Description: Enter Number of IPv6 required on PKT1 port

EipAssociationOnMgt.Description: Link Mgt0 interface with an EIP to login to the instance from public network

ReveseNatEnablePkt0.Description: Enable the Reverse NAT functionality for pkt0 interface

ReveseNatEnablePkt1.Description: Enable the Reverse NAT functionality for pkt1 interface

VolumeType.Description: Select Type of Volume for SBC

IOPS.Description: Enter IOPS reservation for io1 type EBS volume [<= 1950], for gp2 EBS volumes this value is ignored by template.

VolumeSize.Description: Enter size of disk in GiB. Minimum disk required is 65 GiB

DeleteVolumesOnTermination.Description: Enable this to delete the instance volume when the Stack is deleted

ThirdPartyCpus.Description: Enter number of CPUs to be reserved for use with third party apps.

UseAnonymizationFeature.Description: Enable this feature for log Anonymization.

EnableCloudWatchMetrics.Description: Enable this for capturing instance metrics at cloudwatch.

ThirdPartyMem.Description: Enter how many MB of memory to allow for use with third party apps.

EmsUsername.Description: User name for registering with EMS

EmsFqdn.Description: EMS Fully Qualified Domain Name - e.g. instance1._ems._tcp.example.com

ClusterID.Description: Cluster/VNF ID value from EMS Cluster Mgmt.

Label.default: Secondary IP configuration for PKT0 and PKT1

Assertions.AssertDescription: xlarge/2xlarge instance types only support up to 15 IPv4 addresses attached per interface (including primary IP)
xlarge/2xlarge instance types only support up to 15 IPv4 addresses attached per interface (including primary IP)
xlarge/2xlarge instance types only support up to 15 IPv6 addresses attached per interface
xlarge/2xlarge instance types only support up to 15 IPv6 addresses attached per interface

DefaultCliAdminPassword.Description: It is eth0 interface-id of instance which has assigned active role in the template. This is used as default CLI admin password

ceNamesMatching.Value: CE Names of Active and Standby are same. ERROR. Not creating any resources.

ActiveCeAndSystemNameMatching.Value: CE Name of Active and System Name are same. ERROR. Not creating any resources.

StandbyCeAndSystemNameMatching.Value: CE Name of Standby and System Name are same. ERROR. Not creating any resources.
